product_name: Louis Garneau Connect Bike Gloves - Men's
long_description: Elite racers connect with the Louis Garneau Connect Bike Gloves for men. Their power-mesh backs and Pittards(R) synthetic leather palms offer superb feel, ventilation and comfort. Seamless backs with mesh insets provide excellent airflow. Pittards WR100X palms with X-Vent ventilation and padding maximize comfort and handlebar feel, offer better grip and stability, and increase airflow. Laser-cut fingers are anti-abrasion; pull-loops at fingers help you remove gloves. Microfiber thumb absorbs moisture. Louis Garneau Connect Bike Gloves for men feature an ergonomic cuff and high-viz reflective logo.
short_description: Elite racers connect with the Louis Garneau Connect Bike Gloves for men. Their power-mesh backs and Pittards(R) synthetic leather palms offer superb feel, ventilation and comfort.
